trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Peoria
There were no other sightings in Peoria on or around June 27th 2003
divs: Sighting DetailsI had come home from the movies, driving home all by myself. And when i lookedto see if my mother had left the lights on i saw these 2 bright white lights inthe sky to the west.They looked like two circles and they were white. They hadthis glow to them and it would fade in and out.But in a slow beat. and when ipulled home i went inside got my dad and we went back outside and the lightswhere gone but then it looked like there was a helicopter like the direction thelights were headed. So now we went back inside got the binoculers. But we stillcouldnt get a clear view of the copter.Then it stayed in the aircopter for aboutlike 5-10 mins then it went away south in a slow pace.
